version_description:
• Removed 9 tab limit. (9 tabs are kept active, the rest are reloaded when selected)
• Brave shield fixes for: forbes.com, macworld.com, pcworld.com, techhive.com
• Faster app startup
• When showing top sites, also show bottom toolbar
• After app shutdown, restore the last tab with full history
• UI changes: cookie control setting now properly shown as checked; add shadow to side panel; fix showing "about:" in url display

• Removed 9 tab limit. (9 tabs are kept active, the rest are reloaded when selected)
• Brave shield fixes for: forbes.com, macworld.com, pcworld.com, techhive.com
• Faster app startup
• When showing top sites, also show bottom toolbar
• After app shutdown, restore the last tab with full history
• UI changes: cookie control setting now properly shown as checked; add shadow to side panel; fix showing "about:" in url display

• Removed 9 tab limit. (9 tabs are kept active, the rest are reloaded when selected)
• Brave shield fixes for: forbes.com, macworld.com, pcworld.com, techhive.com
• Faster app startup
• When showing top sites, also show bottom toolbar
• After app shutdown, restore the last tab with full history
• UI changes: cookie control setting now properly shown as checked; add shadow to side panel; fix showing "about:" in url display

• Bug where pages needed to be reloaded to scroll is fixed
• HTTPS lock icon should now show up correctly when a site is secure
• Startup was slow on 1.0, faster on 1.1, and now even a bit faster
• Crash fixes for: Using spotlight to search open Brave tabs, 3D touch to open a new tab, and a general browsing crash
• In Tab Tray mode, hide the buttons in the bottom toolbar to avoid confusion with the also-visible top toolbar

• Bug where pages needed to be reloaded to scroll is fixed
• HTTPS lock icon should now show up correctly when a site is secure
• Startup was slow on 1.0, faster on 1.1, and now even a bit faster
• Crash fixes for: Using spotlight to search open Brave tabs, 3D touch to open a new tab, and a general browsing crash
• In Tab Tray mode, hide the buttons in the bottom toolbar to avoid confusion with the also-visible top toolbar

• Bug where pages needed to be reloaded to scroll is fixed
• HTTPS lock icon should now show up correctly when a site is secure
• Startup was slow on 1.0, faster on 1.1, and now even a bit faster
• Crash fixes for: Using spotlight to search open Brave tabs, 3D touch to open a new tab, and a general browsing crash
• In Tab Tray mode, hide the buttons in the bottom toolbar to avoid confusion with the also-visible top toolbar

• Private browsing mode
• "Open in Brave" iOS Share Extension to share web pages from other apps to Brave, such as from Safari.
• Lots of site loading fixes, for instance: github.com, 12factor.net, mlssoccer.com

• Private browsing mode
• "Open in Brave" iOS Share Extension to share web pages from other apps to Brave, such as from Safari.
• Lots of site loading fixes, for instance: github.com, 12factor.net, mlssoccer.com

• Private browsing mode
• "Open in Brave" iOS Share Extension to share web pages from other apps to Brave, such as from Safari.
• Lots of site loading fixes, for instance: github.com, 12factor.net, mlssoccer.com

• Back/Forward history swiping. Swipe away!
• HTTPS-E fixes, most importantly that too many certificate warnings were shown on sites such as breitbart.com and reddit.com.
• More thumbnails shown in the top sites view. Is it too many? Let us know.

• Back/Forward history swiping. Swipe away!
• HTTPS-E fixes, most importantly that too many certificate warnings were shown on sites such as breitbart.com and reddit.com.
• More thumbnails shown in the top sites view. Is it too many? Let us know.

• Back/Forward history swiping. Swipe away!
• HTTPS-E fixes, most importantly that too many certificate warnings were shown on sites such as breitbart.com and reddit.com.
• More thumbnails shown in the top sites view. Is it too many? Let us know.

New Brave Shield: Block Phishing and Malware for safer browsing!
Users of 1Password and LastPass can enable an optional shortcut feature in the Settings for faster access to these.

Lots of fixes:
• Private Browsing bug fixed where some cookies were sticking around. Same fixes for 'Clear Private Data' in the Settings
• HTTPS Everywhere rules upgraded to the latest
• Settings button was way too hard to tap
• Show the bookmarked status of the current webpage, without having to open the side panel
• Higher resolution favicons
• Handle mailto: links properly
• Fix copying animated GIFs to other apps
• In top sites view, pre-loaded top sites can be deleted
• Various performance fixes, app should feel a tiny bit snappier
• Facebook messaging page wasn't scrolling properly, let us know if you see this again
• If app killed in Private mode, empty tabs would be shown on startup –now fixed.

Fix to HTTPS Everywhere blocking sites like tmz.com and spiegel.de, and blocking images loading on certain sites.
Fix to HTTPS Everywhere blocking sites like tmz.com and spiegel.de, and blocking images loading on certain sites.
Fix to HTTPS Everywhere blocking sites like tmz.com and spiegel.de, and blocking images loading on certain sites.

• Fixed pages sometimes cut off (and not scrollable) on load. This was our top complaint. Help to make a new top complaint using Settings>Report a bug!
• New reload button in toolbar.
• Fixed wrong icon/title sometimes shown for history entries.
• Clearing private data now clears the current page, closing all web pages.
• Top and bottom toolbars no longer misbehaving and detaching from the screen edge.
• Fixed long-press context menu bugs: sometimes wasn't showing on SkySports.com, and it wasn't showing on ANY web pages on iOS 8
• New style of bookmark button. We like yellow stars instead of orange, even though less than 10% of stars are actually yellow (the sun falls into that group).

• Fixed pages sometimes cut off (and not scrollable) on load. This was our top complaint. Help to make a new top complaint using Settings>Report a bug!
• New reload button in toolbar.
• Fixed wrong icon/title sometimes shown for history entries.
• Clearing private data now clears the current page, closing all web pages.
• Top and bottom toolbars no longer misbehaving and detaching from the screen edge.
• Fixed long-press context menu bugs: sometimes wasn't showing on SkySports.com, and it wasn't showing on ANY web pages on iOS 8
• New style of bookmark button. We like yellow stars instead of orange, even though less than 10% of stars are actually yellow (the sun falls into that group).

• Fixed pages sometimes cut off (and not scrollable) on load. This was our top complaint. Help to make a new top complaint using Settings>Report a bug!
• New reload button in toolbar.
• Fixed wrong icon/title sometimes shown for history entries.
• Clearing private data now clears the current page, closing all web pages.
• Top and bottom toolbars no longer misbehaving and detaching from the screen edge.
• Fixed long-press context menu bugs: sometimes wasn't showing on SkySports.com, and it wasn't showing on ANY web pages on iOS 8
• New style of bookmark button. We like yellow stars instead of orange, even though less than 10% of stars are actually yellow (the sun falls into that group).

• Too many top sites shown! Changed back to just 2 rows by request of many.
• Now supports opening a new tab when requested by web page (window.open() and '_blank' link targets)
• Updated HTTPS-Everywhere and Tracking Protection rules
• Keyboard shortcuts (handy for iPad Pro users)
• Brave Shield setting is now remembered per-site, and cleared when Clear History is used
• Private Browsing: Google searches in PB mode should never autocomplete after you leave PB mode
• Plethora of little fixes: pull-to-refresh when zoomed in on a page fixed, switching tabs not updating bookmark and reload status is fixed, DuckDuckGo was missing from some locales, back swipe is a bit faster to reload

The previous 1.2.6 release had all the fabulous features, this release is fixing bugs we missed:
• Fixed a locale-specific crash for Netherlands and Belarus.
• Fixed 2FA authentication bug (such as GitHub) where switching back to Brave would cause a page reload.

The previous 1.2.6 release had all the fabulous features, this release is fixing bugs we missed:
• Fixed a locale-specific crash for Netherlands and Belarus.
• Fixed 2FA authentication bug (such as GitHub) where switching back to Brave would cause a page reload.

The previous 1.2.6 release had all the fabulous features, this release is fixing bugs we missed:
• Fixed a locale-specific crash for Netherlands and Belarus.
• Fixed 2FA authentication bug (such as GitHub) where switching back to Brave would cause a page reload.

New Brave Shields Panel and new shields! The "Block Scripts" shield will block all javascript on the page, and the "Fingerprinting Protection" shield will block common methods websites use to secretly identify visitors.
The panel shows information on the number of blocked items per-page.
Also:
• fixed: selecting a top site now loads the domain, not a specific page on that site
• long press history/bookmark to show context menu
• iPad side panels now close by tapping web view

New Brave Shields Panel and new shields! The "Block Scripts" shield will block all javascript on the page, and the "Fingerprinting Protection" shield will block common methods websites use to secretly identify visitors.
The panel shows information on the number of blocked items per-page.
Also:
• fixed: selecting a top site now loads the domain, not a specific page on that site
• long press history/bookmark to show context menu
• iPad side panels now close by tapping web view

New Brave Shields Panel and new shields! The "Block Scripts" shield will block all javascript on the page, and the "Fingerprinting Protection" shield will block common methods websites use to secretly identify visitors.
The panel shows information on the number of blocked items per-page.
Also:
• fixed: selecting a top site now loads the domain, not a specific page on that site
• long press history/bookmark to show context menu
• iPad side panels now close by tapping web view
Fixed a private browsing bug introduced in 1.2.8: page could open new tabs in non-Private mode.
Fixed a private browsing bug introduced in 1.2.8: page could open new tabs in non-Private mode.
Fixed a private browsing bug introduced in 1.2.8: page could open new tabs in non-Private mode.

New tabs bar! You can even turn this on for iPhone in portrait mode: use Settings > Show Tabs Bar.

Fixes:
- a nasty 'dead tab' bug, where a tab would stop responding to taps
- show network and DNS error pages when page can't load
- screenshots on the Tabs Tray should show up more reliably, and use less memory.

New tabs bar! You can even turn this on for iPhone in portrait mode: use Settings > Show Tabs Bar.

Fixes:
- a nasty 'dead tab' bug, where a tab would stop responding to taps
- show network and DNS error pages when page can't load
- screenshots on the Tabs Tray should show up more reliably, and use less memory.

New tabs bar! You can even turn this on for iPhone in portrait mode: use Settings > Show Tabs Bar.

Fixes:
- a nasty 'dead tab' bug, where a tab would stop responding to taps
- show network and DNS error pages when page can't load
- screenshots on the Tabs Tray should show up more reliably, and use less memory.

Bug fix version: links opening new tabs (such as clicking links in Facebook) would hang. This was not very nice. 
And, on iOS 8, app could crash taking screenshot for tab preview. Also not so nice.

Bug fix version: links opening new tabs (such as clicking links in Facebook) would hang. This was not very nice. 
And, on iOS 8, app could crash taking screenshot for tab preview. Also not so nice.

Bug fix version: links opening new tabs (such as clicking links in Facebook) would hang. This was not very nice. 
And, on iOS 8, app could crash taking screenshot for tab preview. Also not so nice.

• Tabs bar is now taller, and only the active tab gets a close button.
• iOS 8 crashing taking screenshots for the Tab Tray is still a thorn in our side, tried again to fix this
• Fix mp3s not playing
• Better Unicode URLs support
• Non-https pages with HTTPS-E off should load faster
• Deleting a Top Site: delete button was hard to hit

• Tabs bar is now taller, and only the active tab gets a close button.
• iOS 8 crashing taking screenshots for the Tab Tray is still a thorn in our side, tried again to fix this
• Fix mp3s not playing
• Better Unicode URLs support
• Non-https pages with HTTPS-E off should load faster
• Deleting a Top Site: delete button was hard to hit

• Tabs bar is now taller, and only the active tab gets a close button.
• iOS 8 crashing taking screenshots for the Tab Tray is still a thorn in our side, tried again to fix this
• Fix mp3s not playing
• Better Unicode URLs support
• Non-https pages with HTTPS-E off should load faster
• Deleting a Top Site: delete button was hard to hit

• New settings switch for "always on" private mode, this turns Brave iOS into a fully private-mode browser.
• New Share menu action to request desktop site in a new tab.
• Super-fast HTTPS-Everywhere (this was slowing page loading).
• Wrong URL sometimes shown after selecting tab in tab tray, fixed.
• "Open in iTunes" could crash, fixed.

• New settings switch for "always on" private mode, this turns Brave iOS into a fully private-mode browser.
• New Share menu action to request desktop site in a new tab.
• Super-fast HTTPS-Everywhere (this was slowing page loading).
• Wrong URL sometimes shown after selecting tab in tab tray, fixed.
• "Open in iTunes" could crash, fixed.

• New settings switch for "always on" private mode, this turns Brave iOS into a fully private-mode browser.
• New Share menu action to request desktop site in a new tab.
• Super-fast HTTPS-Everywhere (this was slowing page loading).
• Wrong URL sometimes shown after selecting tab in tab tray, fixed.
• "Open in iTunes" could crash, fixed.

Bug Fixes! (Next release will be more exciting.)
• Certificate error popup on skysports, arstechnica, and various other sites, is fixed.
• Tapping on bottom of screen shows bottom toolbar.
• Clearing private data wasn't properly removing history.
• Fixes for opening desktop tab while in Private Browsing mode.

Bug Fixes! (Next release will be more exciting.)
• Certificate error popup on skysports, arstechnica, and various other sites, is fixed.
• Tapping on bottom of screen shows bottom toolbar.
• Clearing private data wasn't properly removing history.
• Fixes for opening desktop tab while in Private Browsing mode.

Release to fix context-menu showing too easily when tapping on links
Release to fix context-menu showing too easily when tapping on links
Release to fix context-menu showing too easily when tapping on links

• iOS 10 compatibility
• iPad tabs bar gets a plus button
• Bookmarks can now be edited and organized in folders
• Top Sites no longer shows sites visited one time only (and deleting Top Sites on long-press is fixed)
• Fix bottom toolbar covering the bottom of some sites
• Fix typing with certain Chinese & Japanese keyboards in URL bar

• iOS 10 compatibility
• iPad tabs bar gets a plus button
• Bookmarks can now be edited and organized in folders
• Top Sites no longer shows sites visited one time only (and deleting Top Sites on long-press is fixed)
• Fix bottom toolbar covering the bottom of some sites
• Fix typing with certain Chinese & Japanese keyboards in URL bar

• iOS 10 compatibility
• iPad tabs bar gets a plus button
• Bookmarks can now be edited and organized in folders
• Top Sites no longer shows sites visited one time only (and deleting Top Sites on long-press is fixed)
• Fix bottom toolbar covering the bottom of some sites
• Fix typing with certain Chinese & Japanese keyboards in URL bar

• Sharing menu bugs to copy url, send to Twitter or email, are fixed
• 1Password/LastPass shortcut is fixed, now shows as a button instead of popup
• on iOS 10, the print dialog was crashing
• exiting Private Browsing could cause the app to hang while entering regular mode
• new translations, security fixes, UI fixes and more, thanks for your support!

Fixes for:
• database corruption if app is quickly backgrounded and foregrounded during startup
• sorting bookmarks not working in some cases
• displayed URL not changing to current page URL
• updated Tracking Protection list

• database corruption if app is quickly backgrounded and foregrounded during startup
• sorting bookmarks not working in some cases
• displayed URL not changing to current page URL
• updated Tracking Protection list

• database corruption if app is quickly backgrounded and foregrounded during startup
• sorting bookmarks not working in some cases
• displayed URL not changing to current page URL
• updated Tracking Protection list

• New reader mode! Tap the reader icon in the url bar to view the current page in reader mode
• Text fields in Facebook no longer covered by the keyboard 
• New shield blocking statistics shown on top sites page
• 'Report a bug' now links to https://community.brave.com, our public support forum
• Smushed some crashing bugs

• New reader mode! Tap the reader icon in the url bar to view the current page in reader mode
• Text fields in Facebook no longer covered by the keyboard 
• New shield blocking statistics shown on top sites page

• New reader mode! Tap the reader icon in the url bar to view the current page in reader mode
• Text fields in Facebook no longer covered by the keyboard 
• New shield blocking statistics shown on top sites page
• 'Report a bug' now links to https://community.brave.com, our public support forum
• Smushed some crashing bugs

• Updated Adblock and Tracking Protection filters to catch ads that were leaking through
• Additional search engines added
• Users in non-English language regions should can enable "Regional Adblock" in the settings for additional ad blocking
• Fixes to bookmarking UI
• Shield changes per-site now saving reliably

• Updated Adblock and Tracking Protection filters to catch ads that were leaking through

• Additional search engines added
• Users in non-English language regions should can enable "Regional Adblock" in the settings for additional ad blocking
• Fixes to bookmarking UI
• Shield changes per-site now saving reliably

Quick fix for styling bugs, mainly the tabs bar not disappearing when the top toolbar is hidden.

- Bitwarden password manager added, check it out!
- Lots of stability improvements with tabs and app restoration
- Significant polish to scrolling and clicking links
- Use the navigation bar to "Find in Page"
- Support for nested folders
- Many visual and behavioral improvements

Come join Brave's community to recommend features or submit issues at: community.brave.com

This one’s just a small update with a couple of tweaks for some popular sites, and newer devices. We also have a handful of under-the-hood changes which should make things generally faster, smoother, and more reliable.

Highlights:

- We’ve been tracking down a crash bug on YouTube and think we might finally have this one taken care of. Fingers crossed.
- iOS looks quite different on new iPhones. We needed to catch up. This release has a bunch of little tweaks to how things look on the iPhone XS and XR.
- We’ve added support for the new iPad Pro.

Thank you again for using Brave, we've lots of exciting updates coming down the pipeline.

For questions or comments please check out https://community.brave.com/ or send us an email at support@brave.com

Hello, happy holidays everyone. Just a small update to fix some bugs with our shiny new v1.7 release last week. Thanks very much to everyone who reported these!
 
Here’s what we changed

- The New Tab/New Private Tab buttons were missing the long press context menu, so we added that menu.
- We were blocking links in Bing search results. We’re not doing that any more.
- After upgrading to v1.7, some people saw the private tabs they had open in the last release, which is a pretty major goof. Won’t happen again. Version 1.7 also has a bunch of additional protections which prevent private tab info from ever being stored — these are all brand new and weren’t there in prior versions.
- We fixed a bunch of pages which weren’t loading right as of v1.7.

We have a whole bunch more exciting stuff in store for you in 2019. As ever, thanks for using Brave and have a great holiday season. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community .brave.com, or you can reach us at http://brave.com/msupport or support+ios@brave.com

Hello, happy holidays everyone. Just a small update to fix some bugs with our shiny new v1.7 release last week. Thanks very much to everyone who reported these!
 
Here’s what we changed

- The New Tab/New Private Tab buttons were missing the long press context menu, so we added that menu.
- We were blocking links in Bing search results. We’re not doing that any more.
- After upgrading to v1.7, some people saw the private tabs they had open in the last release, which is a pretty major goof. Won’t happen again. Version 1.7 also has a bunch of additional protections which prevent private tab info from ever being stored — these are all brand new and weren’t there in prior versions.
- We fixed a bunch of pages which weren’t loading right as of v1.7.

We have a whole bunch more exciting stuff in store for you in 2019. As ever, thanks for using Brave and have a great holiday season. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community .brave.com, or you can reach us at http://brave.com/msupport or support+ios@brave.com

Happy new year; here’s a little update with a couple of goodies just for you.

Here’s what we updated:

- HTTPS-Everywhere is back. Whenever you visit a site which supports HTTPS, your connection automatically gets encrypted if possible.
- Bookmarks are easier to manage.
- Look, gifs are important. We’ve made saving them to your phone work right. You’re free to meme however you please. 

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com, or you can reach us directly at http://brave.com/msupport or support+ios@brave.com

Hello all you wonderful people, here’s a little update with some little fixes and a big Shields feature.

Here’s what we updated:

- Cookie Control is back! You can now block all cookies. This was one of the things we had to basically rebuild from scratch when we switched browser engines to WKWebView back in December. So it’s all very new and shiny and modern and new we would appreciate it if you didn’t scratch the paintwork. 
- Bookmarks are easier to use. 
- Everyone hates it when Brave crashes, so we made that happen less. It’s more complicated than it sounds.
- iPads are supposed to look big and beautiful, but we weren’t looking as beautiful as we wanted. A little UI self-care and we’re pretty as ever.
- Our translations needed a whole lot of love. Now they only need a lot of love. We’re trying, we promise!

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com, or you can reach us directly at http://brave.com/msupport or support+ios@brave.com where we 100% guarantee that an actual human person will definitely read your email.

Big news: Brave Sync now lets you sync your bookmarks — with total privacy, even from Brave.

We’ve also made a whole bunch of smaller improvements all over the place.

- Adding and managing bookmarks is easier and more straightforward.
- Ad blocking outside the US is much improved with the addition of region-specific block lists.
- The Qwant & Startpage search engine popups work correctly in private mode again.
- Settings now has a quick link to review Brave. Reviews are the number one thing helping people find Brave. If you appreciate Brave, consider leaving us a review — or tell a friend.

Thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com, or you can reach us directly at http://brave.com/msupport or support+ios@brave.com where we 100% guarantee that an actual human person will definitely read your email.

We’ve packed a lot into this release. 

We’ve made some changes to the look and feel of Brave on your iPhone making more space in the address bar and moving the menu button to the bottom bar. 
Pinch to zoom functionality on all websites. 
Housekeeping and  a few other small fixes.

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com, or you can reach us directly at http://brave.com/msupport

Welcome to a big update to Brave. We’ve packed a lot into this release to support iOS 13, here are some highlights: 

Dark Mode, easy on the eye. Dark mode integrates with iOS 13’s settings and automatically adjusts from light to dark,
We’ve added a much-requested downloaded manager,
This release supports iPadOS, visiting websites on your iPad will display the desktop version of the website vs the mobile site,
We have added a shortcut for accessing your Bookmarks, you’ll find that in settings, 
Housekeeping and a few other small fixes.

If you have a feature idea, let us know on http://brave.com/msupport

We’ve spent a long time working on this update and we hope you enjoy it. If you do, we’d really appreciate if you would leave a review. 

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com

Welcome to a big update to Brave. We’ve packed a lot into this release to support iOS 13, here are some highlights: 

Dark Mode, easy on the eye. Dark mode integrates with iOS 13’s settings and automatically adjusts from light to dark,
We’ve added a much-requested downloaded manager,
This release supports iPadOS, visiting websites on your iPad will display the desktop version of the website vs the mobile site,
We have added a shortcut for accessing your Bookmarks, you’ll find that in settings, 
Housekeeping and a few other small fixes.

If you have a feature idea, let us know on http://brave.com/msupport

We’ve spent a long time working on this update and we hope you enjoy it. If you do, we’d really appreciate if you would leave a review. 

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com

Big news: Brave Rewards is now available.

Brave Rewards lets you support the creators you love while blocking online trackers and the invasive ads which rely on them. Tap the triangular BAT icon in the URL bar to get started with Brave Rewards. 

We’ve also made some improvements to Dark mode and a few other housekeeping fixes.

If you have a feature idea, let us know on http://brave.com/msupport

We’ve spent a long time working on this update and we hope you enjoy it. If you do, we’d really appreciate if you would leave a review. 

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com

This is a small release with some nice improvements.

We added an “x” to the URL bar to make it faster to clear your search term,
Tapping on an external link that opens another app now requires you to give it the okay,
Housekeeping and a few other small fixes.

Some of you are experiencing bookmark issues, we are working on a fix, please standby for that. 

As ever, thanks for using Brave. If you’ve got any questions or comments, check out https://community.brave.com, or you can reach us directly at http://brave.com/msupport
